title: TST CREW SHOW - Trackhawk and Hyundais
description:
It's Matt and Zack in the studio today talking about what they've driven recently, and have on the to-drive list. Turns out there's a Hemi on both lists, which gives us a little pause. We talk about the new Veloster R Spec vs the Civic Si, weird one-off cars, Waze, and answer a lot of great questions. 

This episode is also a video: https://youtu.be/_YXtLv7KbKA

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman 

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman 

 

Check out our merch!

https://teespring.com/stores/thesmokingtire?page=1
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
